Articles.Content:
Hey guys! Spent the last couple of nights working on something. It's not quiet done but its all for now untill I learn how to make a GIF. (website I use has a time and size limit.)

(if anyone can help with this let me know please!!)

Anyway I present the Saturn V in pixel form. Lets hear some constructive comments!

Having a beast computer and seeing everything in 60-200 FPS, this (Don't take it as a hurtful or mean comment) has begun to hurt my eyes. The art itself isn't half bad, but it would be nice if you could add more frames

Having a beast computer and seeing everything in 60-200 FPS, this (Don't take it as a hurtful or mean comment) has begun to hurt my eyes. The art itself isn't half bad, but it would be nice if you could add more frames

I agree with needing more frames 100%! This is my first try at pixel animation ever so I think its going well. I am still adding more frames, trying to add more to improve the FPS. Not sure though just because I don't have a scale based on how many pixels per speed.
So I have the full thing done, just can't figure out how to export the layers out as a gif that will work...

Don't mean to bump but got it done.

didn't do pod reentry cause flames were really making me mad after a while. I'm thinking maybe a shuttle or ISS next?
